title: Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.31
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-20152 (E)    091225     
*2520152* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 72 (a) 
Strengthening of the coordination of humanitarian and 
disaster relief assistance of the United Nations, including 
special economic assistance: strengthening of the coordination 
of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations 
 
 
 
United States of America:* amendment to draft resolution A/80/L.25 
 
 
Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian 
assistance of the United Nations  
 
 
 
In operative paragraph 68, after “including sexual and reproductive health”, 
insert “in accordance with the Programme of Action of the International Conference 
on Population and Development** and its review outcomes as adopted by the General 
Assembly,”. 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting. 
 
** Report of the International Conference on Population and Development, Cairo, 
5– 13 September 1994 (United Nations publication, Sales No. E.95.XIII.18), chap. I, 
resolution 1, annex.
